channel.title: Prayer/Curses
channel.description: Ok in the game it seems when a player attacks another, they get smited/prayer is drained quickly, that player attacking does not have smite activated. Also, prayer runs out very quickly, and I was wondering if deleting this smite problem would fix that, anyone help?

item.title: Prayer/Curses
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

It’s alright…You did however point me in a direction in wich I can test a few things with the prayer drain rate, and we’ll see if it will do any good. Highly doubt it though, worth a try.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer/Curses
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

Well then yes it’s the prayer drain affect when attacked by another player that I need to delete, question is…how?..Any clue?
^ by this I mean if a player is in a fight with another player in PvP if player 1 attacks player 2, player 1 drains player 2’s prayer without smite activated.
Any idea how to be rid of the smite affect?

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer/Curses
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:5, topic:393918”]pretty sure I found it, it says public final int[] PRAYER_DRAIN_RATE = & public final int[] CURSEE_DRAIN_RATE = in the Player class… after the “=” it’s a line of just “500” so it looks like…public final int[] PRAYER_DRAIN_RATE = {500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500}; & public final int[] CURSE_DRAIN_RATE = {500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500,500};
Is that the normal drain rate?[/quote]yes it is

Read full topic
